pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 6 $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0 $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() from Frogspawn $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Tadpoles$() follow a $(thing)Player$() that is holding a $(item)Slimeball$().$(br2)$(thing)Tadpoles$() grows up into one of the variants of a $(thing)Frog$() depending on the biome. $(br2)Its growth may be accelerated by feeding it $(item)Slimeballs$().
